titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to permit the Secretary of a military department to grant veterans access to certain fitness centers under the jurisdiction of such Secretary, and for other purposes.
Ensuring Veterans Access to Military Fitness Facilities Act of 2018
Ensuring Veterans Access to Military Fitness Facilities Act of 2018
Ensuring Veterans Access to Military Fitness Facilities Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Readiness.
